mapper.select: SELECT a.request_body requestBody, a.reponse_body reponseBody FROM api_mation a WHERE a.request_url = #{urlId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO api_mation (id, request_url, request_body, reponse_body, app_id, create_id, create_time, last_update_id, last_update_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{urlId}, #{requestBody}, #{reponseBody}, #{appId}, #{userId}, #{currentTime}, #{userId}, #{currentTime})
